title: 2048 Classic
description: The addictive puzzle game where you combine numbered tiles to reach 2048! Strategize your moves to keep the board from filling up.

title: Hextris
description: A fast-paced hexagonal version of tetris. Rotate the hexagon to capture falling blocks and match colors to clear lines.

title: Snake Royale
description: The definitive snake experience brought into the modern era. Eat to grow longer, but avoid hitting walls or your own tail.

title: Retro Maze
description: Step back in time with this legendary maze arcade game. Gobble pellets, dodge ghosts, and aim for the high score.

title: Chess Master
description: Sharpen your mind with the ultimate game of strategy. Play against advanced engines or challenge your friends.

title: Flappy Bird
description: Navigate the bird through the green pipes in this notoriously difficult classic. One hit and it's game over!
